alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL KOSCIUSKO AND SOUTHEASTERN MARSHALL COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bourbon, or 9 miles south of Nappanee, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Warsaw, Winona Lake, Bourbon, Pierceton, Mentone, Tippecanoe, Etna Green, Leesburg, Claypool, Burket, Sidney, Little Chapman Lake, Monoquet, Hoffman Lake, Atwood, Irish Lake, Palestine, Sechrist Lake, Big Chapman Lake, and Packerton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
